content.body: Sorry I didn’t review Andreu’s PR earlier. Let’s avoid the term “asynchronous callstack” as it is confusing and misleading (doesn’t make it clear that run has to be explicit). Instead, we are talking about the asynchronous flow of control.
Also would be good if the spec had a sort of introduction that linked to the readme
Maybe it should begin with the definition of the AsyncContext class and then go into how it works
